TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted(?)

I wish i could move objects with my mind.
Granted, but they fall in on you and crush you.

Er!o! W!s# n%t fou$

I wish to have infinite wishes

granted, but you wish that the world would end and it dose

I wish to not wish
Ninja'd, disreqard post.

Granted You aways Get Ninja'd

I wish Forum games would Not Derail Into MLP topics

Granted, they derail into furry topics

I wish people didnt make a fuss about MLP derailments, it just makes em worse.

granted...but PONIES

I wish that people would accept ponies and the fandom

Granted, People embrace every aspect, even the R34 and explicit stuff. OH GOD NO.

I wish non bronies would stop bringing the subject of MLP up and then blame the bronies for derailment! Bah!

granted

what you want me to corrupt that?

I wish for the samething

Granted but the non bronies still do it

Seriously if a forum game derails into ponies im gonna quit it includes this THREAD

I wish i would stop getting addicted to forum games

Then don't bring the subject up!

Granted, you never post in Forum games again.

I wish people knew about my new Fan work (Check KSP fan works for KSP Birthday game)

Granted, but it's boring

I wish that people would not bring up that one subject.

Granted. People won't bring it up, but you will get a song stuck to your head singing that subject.

I wish I had a pony :c

granted, it's a real pony, like, the actual ones. but as ugly as someones ugly momma

I wish women weren't possessed

Granted. You are.

I wish everyone worked together to biologically create a Mudkip.

Granted. It dies because it can't resists our bacteria

I wish for reputation

Granted. The bad one (Muahahahahhahahha)

I wish i lived in the Kerbal universe

Granted, you get strapped to an SRB.

I wish that I wish that I wished about wishes.

Granted, You wished to wish about nothing realy, so I can say that you wished to be banned into limbo.

I wish to do graphs about MLP (fan boom, virality, etc.)

granted but you make them backwards.

I wish I didn't suck at forum games

Granted, you suck at anything ecept forum games

I wish to be a scientist

You become a poop scientist

I wish people would stop fighting about MLP derailments, talking about mlp... just freaking move on with it.
What, you want me to corrupt that?

No. Im just wishing that people didnt make a bif deal out of the mlp derailments.

I wish for a cookie.
